722768f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, at the N. E. corner of West 114th Street, showing the Althea Rudd Ward home of the 1800's. This, a family holding for more that 50 years, is in fact more than 100 years old. A newspaper clipping, dated January 5, 1911, reports the sale and proposed demolition of same for a modern 12 story apartment building. The A. C. & H. M. Hall Realty Co. is the new owner.
1911
H. N. Tiemann, photo
Gift of Urbrock Collection
NEG: 2832

722767f.text:
417-414 Riverside Drive, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of 114th Street.
1923.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.
Neg. # 2048

722769f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, at the N.E. corner of West 114th Street, showing the Althea Rudd Ward home. This structure, more than 100 years old, is to be razed and replaced with a 12 story apartment building according to a newspaper clipping dated Jan. 5, 1911.

1894

J. S. Johnson, photo
Gift of Urbrock Collection
REPRODUCTION RIGHTS UNKNOWN

NEG. #4312
